event.title: Enhance Your Career With Microsoft Dynamics CRM Certification
event.description:
Microsoft Dynamics CRM – Customer Relationship Management (CRM) is a system for managing a company’s interactions with current and future customers. It often involves using technology to organize, automate, and synchronize sales, marketing, customer service, and technical support.
Microsoft Dynamics CRM software helps sales, marketing, and service professionals improve processes and better manage the customer experience by allowing users to access all of their customer-facing activities through a single interface. … There are a variety of features for productivity, mobile, and customer service.

Schedule and Attend Free Demo here! KBS Microsoft Dynamics CRM Training

Course Features:

30 Days of Instructor Led Dynamics CRM Training
Real World use cases and Scenarios
Practical Approach
Expert & Certified Trainers

About KBS:

KBS is one of the leading Online training providers with a decade of experience in the Online IT training Industry. We trained thousands of students and even handled hundreds of corporates clients across the world.
KBS offers the best training in the industry with industry expertised trainers. Some of our on demand courses such as ServiceNow, Business Intelligence, RPA, Blockchain,and Cyber Security.

Key Features:

Flexible Timings
Certified & Industry Experts Trainers
Multiple Training Delivery Models
Customize Course
